name: The Quest For The King
description:
IF YOU HAVE A SPARE MINUTE CAN YOU PLEASE FILL OUT THIS SURVEY

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf5IqSWkQgdr8r-vEKcaAxCehuT4HF392jW4Ra46evgYpE0eg/viewform

 The player is an alien who lives on a distant planet but discovers the planet has become overrun by vampires The aim of the game is to shoot the vampire enemies and save the companions. 

The aim of the game is to shoot  vampires, develop a kill - streak and pick up lives. 

The lives consists of Companions, the more you collect the more will trail behind you. 

The Quest for the king is an arcade, 2D Platformer, shoot ‘em up, fighting game.

If you like crash bandicoot and abe's oddysee this is the game for you! 

UPLOAD YOUR KILL STREAK IN THE COMMENTS 

To Play 

WASD (or arrows) to move

E- to collect lives and health packs

Mouse look for Gun sight and Left mouse click to shoot - Hold left mouse click for a stronger shot
